subject: Citi Field (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Citi Field’s Fan Walk includes 18,000 bricks. Fans paid up to $400 to have messages engraved for eternity (or until the stadium is torn down). Most fans wished their team well or thanked their father for taking them to their first game. But a few used their 8 inches by 8 inches to pen a poem, show off their Latin or leave readers wondering. Here is an unofficial top 10 list:.
